item.title: Buy 1 board game at Target and get another for 50% off | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Photo: Space Cats Peace Turtles Save on over 600 tabletop titles at Target Target is offering a great opportunity to stock up on essential board games for less. If you add two games participating in...
item.content:encoded: Photo: Space Cats Peace Turtles Save on over 600 tabletop titles at Target Target is offering a great opportunity to stock up on essential board games for less. If you add two games participating in the sale to your cart, the retailer will knock 50% off one that‚Äôs of equal or lesser value. Some of our favorite tabletop titles are included in this promotion. For instance, if you wanted to pick up the fourth edition of Twilight Imperium and its expansion, Prophecy of Kings, you‚Äôd only pay $167.9...

item.title: Steam Families adds way more features for those who share their game libraries | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Photo: Amelia Holowaty Krales/Polygon For when multiple people use your Steam Deck As more people get Steam Decks and other handheld PC consoles, which are much easier to share among households than...
item.content:encoded: Photo: Amelia Holowaty Krales/Polygon For when multiple people use your Steam Deck As more people get Steam Decks and other handheld PC consoles, which are much easier to share among households than a PC, it was integral for Valve to make its generally barebones family-sharing settings more robust. On Monday, the company announced that Steam Families is now available in beta, adding more features for people who want to share games or control access on the platform. Steam Families allows a user...

item.title: Save $20 on pre-orders for Princess Peach Showtime! | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Image: Nintendo First-time QVC customers can get $20 off before the game comes out March 22 Break out your hot pink Joy-Con because Princess Peach Showtime! is almost here. If you‚Äôre as excited as w...
item.content:encoded: Image: Nintendo First-time QVC customers can get $20 off before the game comes out March 22 Break out your hot pink Joy-Con because Princess Peach Showtime! is almost here. If you‚Äôre as excited as we are to play as the royal lady of House Toadstool in her very own platformer, you can currently save $20 on Princess Peach Showtime!. First-time QVC customers can use the code WELCOME20 at checkout, discounting the price to just $39.99 before tax and shipping. Although Princess Peach has frequent...

item.title: Adapting language model architectures for time series forecasting | Amazon Science homepage
item.description: Tokenizing time series data and treating it like a language enables a model whose zero-shot performance matches or exceeds that of purpose-built models.
item.content:encoded: Tokenizing time series data and treating it like a language enables a model whose zero-shot performance matches or exceeds that of purpose-built models.

item.title: MELON: Reconstructing 3D objects from images with unknown poses | Google AI Blog
item.description: Posted by Mark Matthews, Senior Software Engineer, and Dmitry Lagun, Research Scientist, Google Research A person's prior experience and understanding of the world generally enables them to easil...
item.content:encoded: Posted by Mark Matthews, Senior Software Engineer, and Dmitry Lagun, Research Scientist, Google Research A person's prior experience and understanding of the world generally enables them to easily infer what an object looks like in whole, even if only looking at a few 2D pictures of it. Yet the capacity for a computer to reconstruct the shape of an object in 3D given only a few images has remained a difficult algorithmic problem for years. This fundamental computer vision task has applicati...

item.title: What is going on with WB Games‚Äô strategy? | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Image: Player First Games/Warner Bros. Games Adult Swim Games, MultiVersus, Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League, and more Warner Bros. Games has been discussing its business strategy over the pas...
item.content:encoded: Image: Player First Games/Warner Bros. Games Adult Swim Games, MultiVersus, Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League, and more Warner Bros. Games has been discussing its business strategy over the past several weeks, but it seems to be full of contradictions. Hogwarts Legacy, its AAA single-player Harry Potter game, was one of the top-selling games of 2023, but the company instead intends to focus on live-service and free-to-play games in the future, like its underperforming Suicide Squad: Kill ...

item.description: Image: Gwen Basset The five-volume Uncaged Anthology is steeply discounted at the Dungeon Masters Guild The Dungeon Masters Guild is currently offering the Uncaged Anthology Bundle and its 100-plus ...
item.content:encoded: Image: Gwen Basset The five-volume Uncaged Anthology is steeply discounted at the Dungeon Masters Guild The Dungeon Masters Guild is currently offering the Uncaged Anthology Bundle and its 100-plus one-shot D&D adventures for just $12.77 (was $31.92). The PDF version of this five-volume anthology includes the Ennie award-winning Uncaged Goddesses, and features printer-friendly versions of each module, in addition to player versions of the maps needed for each module. However, if you‚Äôd prefer h...

item.title: Poker roguelite Balatro is a hit, but announced mobile release will show its true power | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Image: LocalThunk/Playstack We might also be getting official merch! Breakout 2024 poker roguelite hit Balatro is coming to Apple and Android mobile devices, according to solo developer LocalThunk. ...
item.content:encoded: Image: LocalThunk/Playstack We might also be getting official merch! Breakout 2024 poker roguelite hit Balatro is coming to Apple and Android mobile devices, according to solo developer LocalThunk. That‚Äôs great news for all of us currently invested in creating the highest-scoring poker hands, and bad news for our productivity related to anything else. Publisher PlayStack announced the port during a Reddit Ask Me Anything over the weekend, although it didn‚Äôt have any more details on a potential...

item.content:encoded: A mindflayer model and some dice (not included in the set) sit atop a canvas map of the Sword Coast region | Photo: Charlie Hall/Polygon Matthew Lillard‚Äôs luxury boxes keep getting better and better A newbie Dungeon Master, I was attracted to Dungeons & Dragons by the opportunity to spend my free time making delightful experiences for my players. And delighted they were when I plopped a giant canvas map of the Sword Coast region onto my dining room table. I looked at my nephews and my wife, al...

item.title: Remembering the cringe surrounding Super Princess Peach | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Image: Tose/Nintendo Princess Peach: Showtime gives the Mushroom Kingdom icon a more favorable spotlight For the first time in nearly two decades, Princess Peach headlines her own game in the soon-t...
item.content:encoded: Image: Tose/Nintendo Princess Peach: Showtime gives the Mushroom Kingdom icon a more favorable spotlight For the first time in nearly two decades, Princess Peach headlines her own game in the soon-to-be-released Princess Peach: Showtime! for Nintendo Switch. Peach‚Äôs previous starring adventure, Super Princess Peach, debuted on Nintendo DS in 2005, and inverted the typical story of a Super Mario Bros. game, tasking the princess with rescuing dudes in distress Mario and Luigi. Like Super Princes...

item.title: Apex Legends finals postponed after suffering unprecedented hack | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Image: Respawn Entertainment/Electronic Arts Pro players unwittingly given cheats mid-match The North American Apex Legends finals have been postponed after hackers appeared to give competitors chea...
item.content:encoded: Image: Respawn Entertainment/Electronic Arts Pro players unwittingly given cheats mid-match The North American Apex Legends finals have been postponed after hackers appeared to give competitors cheats in the middle of tournament games, in an unprecedented attack on a major esports event. The Apex Legends esports X account said the decision to stop and postpone the event, which was running on Sunday, March 17, had been taken ‚Äúdue to the competitive integrity of this series being compromised.‚Äù O...

item.title: GTA Online‚Äôs community is in limbo while hype builds for GTA 6 | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Image: Rockstar Games What comes next for the wildly successful spinoff? Grand Theft Auto Online started as a mere side attraction in Grand Theft Auto 5 before it expanded into its own colossal beas...
item.content:encoded: Image: Rockstar Games What comes next for the wildly successful spinoff? Grand Theft Auto Online started as a mere side attraction in Grand Theft Auto 5 before it expanded into its own colossal beast. GTA Online has since made billions of dollars and is regularly updated with sizable new chapters that include cameos from real-world celebrities like Dr. Dre. The game is now an MMO in its own right, serving as a replacement for the single-player DLC chapters that Rockstar used to release. But wi...

item.content:encoded: Posted by Mike Schaekermann, Research Scientist, Google Research, and Ivor Horn, Chief Health Equity Officer & Director, Google Core Health equity is a major societal concern worldwide with disparities having many causes. These sources include limitations in access to healthcare, differences in clinical treatment, and even fundamental differences in the diagnostic technology. In dermatology for example, skin cancer outcomes are worse for populations such as minorities, those with lower socio...

item.content:encoded: Posted by Yun Zhu and Lijuan Liu, Software Engineers, Google Research Large language model (LLM) advancements have led to a new paradigm that unifies various natural language processing (NLP) tasks within an instruction-following framework. This paradigm is exemplified by recent multi-task LLMs, such as T0, FLAN, and OPT-IML. item.content:encoded: Hello, this is Android Engineer Shakil from Product Engineering Department. Jetpack Compose is a modern, fully declarative UI toolkit for building native Android user interfaces. In this article I would like to talk about five common pitfalls that one may fall into while writing compose code.

item.description: Posted by Bahare Fatemi and Bryan Perozzi, Research Scientists, Google Research Imagine all the things around you ‚Äî your friends, tools in your kitchen, or even the parts of your bike. They are al...
item.content:encoded: Posted by Bahare Fatemi and Bryan Perozzi, Research Scientists, Google Research Imagine all the things around you ‚Äî your friends, tools in your kitchen, or even the parts of your bike. They are all connected in different ways. In computer science, the term graph is used to describe connections between objects. Graphs consist of nodes (the objects themselves) and edges (connections between two nodes, indicating a relationship between them). Graphs are everywhere now. The internet itself is a ...

item.title: Chain-of-table: Evolving tables in the reasoning chain for table understanding | Google AI Blog
item.description: Posted by Zilong Wang, Student Researcher, and Chen-Yu Lee, Research Scientist, Cloud AI Team People use tables every day to organize and interpret complex information in a structured, easily acce...
item.content:encoded: Posted by Zilong Wang, Student Researcher, and Chen-Yu Lee, Research Scientist, Cloud AI Team People use tables every day to organize and interpret complex information in a structured, easily accessible format. Due to the ubiquity of such tables, reasoning over tabular data has long been a central topic in natural language processing (NLP). Researchers in this field have aimed to leverage language models to help users answer questions, verify statements, and analyze data based on tables. How...

item.title: WTF is Regularization and What is it For? | KDnuggets
item.description: This article explains the concept of regularization and its significance in machine learning and deep learning. We have discussed how regularization can be used to enhance the performance of linear mo...
item.content:encoded: This article explains the concept of regularization and its significance in machine learning and deep learning. We have discussed how regularization can be used to enhance the performance of linear models, as well as how it can be applied to improve the performance of deep learning models.

item.title: Social learning: Collaborative learning with large language models | Google AI Blog
item.description: Posted by Amirkeivan Mohtashami, Research Intern, and Florian Hartmann, Software Engineer, Google Research Large language models (LLMs) have significantly improved the state of the art for solving...
item.content:encoded: Posted by Amirkeivan Mohtashami, Research Intern, and Florian Hartmann, Software Engineer, Google Research Large language models (LLMs) have significantly improved the state of the art for solving tasks specified using natural language, often reaching performance close to that of people. As these models increasingly enable assistive agents, it could be beneficial for them to learn effectively from each other, much like people do in social settings, which would allow LLM-based agents to impro...

item.title: Do text embeddings perfectly encode text? | The Gradient

item.title: Latency from post-quantum cryptography shrinks as data increases | Amazon Science homepage
item.description: Using time to last byte ‚Äî rather than time to first byte ‚Äî to assess the effects of data-heavy TLS 1.3 on real-world connections yields more encouraging results.
